You need a mobile friendly website...now.

Your website needs to be mobile friendly…period. Recent changes to Google’s search algorithm has made mobile-friendliness a ranking signal. What does that mean for you? Simply put, if your site has not been optimized for mobile, your search results will suffer. Don’t be pushed down in Google’s results, a quick mobile optimization of your current website can help assure your search results don’t suffer. Contact AppHammer for a site assessment and mobile optimization quote today.

Our Products

Apphammer is busy developing the next generation of mobile apps and software products to make our clients better. Our problem solving approach helps build clean, thoughtful solutions to complex business problems.

Schedole

Let’s face it, coordinating room schedules is a headache. Finding and booking an open meeting room is a pain too. Schedole ('sced-o-lay') is a room scheduling system like none other. We combine our powerful scheduling system, that seamlessly integrates with your existing Exchange calendars, with a digital sign solution allowing users to browse and book rooms right at the door!

Remote Lab

A student focused online lab solution that grants remote access to specialized software. Students connect from their PC, Mac or mobile device to access software as if they were sitting in an on-campus computer lab. Remote lab is revolutionizing the online learning environment.

Pitch Tracker

Safety is the top priority when it comes to youth athletics. Repetitive motion injuries caused by overuse of under conditioned muscles and joints are a common occurrence. Pitch Tracker helps coaches and parents keep track of a player’s pitch count giving piece of mind and helping reduce the risk of player injury

You Need a Digital Strategy

You have a great business, we know that, but here is the thing, no one will know about your business unless you have a solid digital marketing strategy. Over 90% of all online experiences start with a web search. 75% of users never scroll past the first page of search results. Without a solid strategy your company is lost in the shuffle. AppHammer builds proven digital strategies incorporating content strategy tactics, SEO, email and social marketing, A/B testing, pay-per-click advertising and analytics. You need an expert to navigate these tricky waters, AppHammer is your lifeboat.
